questions.text: Most common pituitary hypersecretion syndrome is
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Most common pituitary hypersecretion syndrome is- Hyperprolactinemia

questions.text: Acromegaly is associated with all of the following except
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Acromegaly is associated with

•    Diabetes mellitus

•    Hyperhidrosis

•    Oily skin

questions.text: Which of the following is cause of cushing’s disease?

Cushing disease is cushing syndrome due to pituitary adenoma.

questions.text: Which of the following is false regarding Addison’s disease?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Addison’s disease(Primary adrenal insufficiency)
•	Autoimmune is most common cause in world
•	↓ACTH, ↓Aldosterone, ↑Renin
•	Weight loss is one of the clinical feature

questions.text: Which of the following is false regarding Conn’s syndrome?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (A)

Conn’s syndrome (Primary hyperaldosteronism)
o	↓Renin, ↑Aldosterone
o	Hypertension
o	Metabolic alkalosis
o	Hypokalemia

choices.text: Symptoms of diabetes plus random blood concentration more than 200 mg/dl

questions.text: Which of the following is false regarding diagnostic criteria of diabetes mellitus?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Diagnostic criteria of diabetes mellitus
•	Symptoms of diabetes plus random blood concentration more than 200 mg/dl
•	2 hour plasma glucose more than 200 mg/dl
•	Fasting plasma glucose more than 126 mg/dl
•	HbA1C more than 6.5%

questions.solution:

Fructosamine assay reflects the glycemic status over the prior 2 weeks.

questions.text: Which of the following sentence is false regarding primary hyperparathyroidism?
questions.solution:

Primary hyperparathyroidism
•	Hypercalcemia
•	Hypophosphatemia

•	Increased CAMP in urine

questions.solution:

Brown tumor of bone is characteristic feature of Primary hyperparathyroidism.

questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Primary hyperparathyroidism
•	Ostetitis fibrosa cystica
•	Rugger jersey spine
•	Salt pepper appearance of skull
•	Constipation

questions.text: Which of the following is not associated with secondary hypothyroidism:
questions.solution:

Secondary hypothyroidism: 
a. Low T3

d. bradycardia

questions.text: Which of the following is not an indication of haemodialysis in tumor lysis syndrome?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Indications of haemodialysis in tumor lysis syndrome
•	Uric acid > 10 mg/dl
•	Serum Phosphate > 10 mg/dl
•	Serum potassium > 6 meq/l
•	Serum creatinine > 10 mg/dl

questions.text: The best marker to diagnose thyroid related disorder is:
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

questions.text: The occurrence of hyperthyroidism following administration of supplemental iodine to subjects with endemic iodine deficiency goiter is known as:
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (A)

The occurrence of hyperthyroidism following administration of supplemental iodine to subjects with endemic iodine deficiency goiter is known as: Jod-Basedow effect

questions.text: Initial Dose of levothyroxine in newly diagnosed case of primary hypothyroidism is

Initial Dose of levothyroxine in newly diagnosed case of primary hypothyroidism is 1.6 mcg/kg.

questions.solution: Correct Answer (D)
